xml.Query_GetPhoneNumberWithPhoneId1: Select phone_number, phone_code, TelelphoneID from [MelloServETL].[dbo].[Telephone] where loan_number = 'LN_NUMBER' AND phone_id = 'PHONE_ID'
xml.Query_UpdatePhoneNumberWithPhoneId1: Update [MelloServETL].[dbo].[Telephone] set phone_number = 'PHN_NUMBER', phone_code = 'PHN_CODE' where loan_number = 'LN_NUMBER' AND TelelphoneID = 'TELEPHONE_ID'
xml.Query_UpdateBorrowersFirstLastAndFullNam: UPDATE [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] SET borrower_first_name = 'FIRST_NAME' , borrower_last_name = 'LAST_NAME', borrower_full_name='FULL_NAME' where loan_number = 'LN_NUMBER'
xml.Query_InsertLoanIntoLoanFlagTableForSkip: INSERT into [MelloServ].[MelloServDomain].[LoanFlag] ( [LoanNumber] ,[FlagId] ,[DateInserted] ,[InsertedBy] ,[DateUpdated] ,[UpdatedBy]) values ('LN_NUMBER','FLAG_ID',DATEADD(SECOND, -2, DATEADD(DAY, -2, GETDATE())),'USER_NAME',DATEADD(DAY, -2, GETDATE()),'USER_NAME')
xml.Query_GetUsersRegisteredViaAutomation: SELECT top 100 [Email] FROM [MelloServ].[LDProfileDomain].[UserProfile] Where email like 'cp_testaccount20%'
xml.QueryToUpdateTCPAFlagIsGlobalValue: UPDATE [MelloServ].[MelloServDomain].[Flag] SET IsGlobal = 'TCPA_FLAG_VALUE', IsEnabled = 'TCPA_FLAG_VALUE' WHERE id = '18'
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForFmAutopayInE: SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code IN ('2', '3', 'B', 'D', 'F', 'H', 'L', 'M', 'N', 'R', 'U', 'W', '!', '8') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6') AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code in ('1','4','6') AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null And [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '7', '8', '9') AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForFmOTPInEligi: SELECT top 1 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code in ('2','3','8','9','A','B','F','H','M','N','P','R','U','W','!') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE'

SELECT top 1 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND pif_stop_code in ('1','2','3','4','5','6') AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE'

SELECT top 1 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND bad_check_stop_code in ('1','4','6') AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE'

SELECT top 1 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND foreclosure_stop_code in ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9') AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForPendingPrepa: SELECT top 100 * FROM [dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND drafting_indicator ZDRAFTING_INDICATOR AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForIneligiblePr: SELECT top 100 * FROM [dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND drafting_indicator ZDRAFTING_INDICATOR AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetFlagIDForASpecificLoanNumber: Select FlagId from MelloServDomain.LoanFlag where LoanNumber = 'LN_NUMBER'
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleAuto: SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO 'FORMATTED_START_DATE' AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN 'FORMATTED_END_DATE' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO 'FORMATTED_START_DATE' AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN 'FORMATTED_END_DATE' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND investor_id='W01' USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO 'FORMATTED_START_DATE' AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN 'FORMATTED_END_DATE' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND zone = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetSettingDetailsForBankHolidays: select SettingValue from MelloServ.MelloServDomain.Settings where SettingKey='Bank_Holidays'
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForBiWeeklyAuto: Select top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND foreclosure_stop_code ='0' AND process_stop_code ='0' AND bad_check_stop_code ='0' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND investor_id ! = 'W01' AND consumer_indicator_code is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator = 'N' or drafting_indicator is null) AND delinquent_payment_count = 0 AND zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

Select top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND foreclosure_stop_code ='0' and process_stop_code ='0' AND bad_check_stop_code ='0' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND consumer_indicator_code is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator = 'N' or drafting_indicator is null) AND delinquent_payment_count = 0 AND investor_id ! = 'W01' AND zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

Select top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 4, 0) AND foreclosure_stop_code ='0' AND process_stop_code ='0' AND bad_check_stop_code ='0' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND consumer_indicator_code is Null AND investor_id ! = 'W01' AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator = 'N' or drafting_indicator is null) AND delinquent_payment_count = 0 AND zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForDeleteAutoPa: SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE())+1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='SETUP_TYPE' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_P ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='SETUP_TYPE' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_P ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='SETUP_TYPE' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_P ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='SETUP_TYPE' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_P ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForDeleteBiWeek: SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE())+2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='SETUP_TYPE' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_P ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForBiWeeklyAuto: Select top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND foreclosure_stop_code ='0' AND process_stop_code ='0' AND bad_check_stop_code ='0' AND investor_id ! = 'W01' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND consumer_indicator_code is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator = 'N' or drafting_indicator is null) AND delinquent_payment_count = 0 AND zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForActiveForbea: SELECT top 100 * FROM MelloServETL.dbo.LoanLevel ll, MelloServETL.dbo.LoanTransaction lt WHERE ll.loan_number = lt.loan_number and is_active = '1' AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND repay_plan_type in ('30','33','35','38','42','90','00','08','09','21','22','27','28') AND repay_plan_status_code in ('A') AND LoanTransactionID=(select top(1) MAX(LoanTransactionID) FROM MelloServETL.dbo.LoanTransaction WHERE loan_number=ll.loan_number) AND consumer_indicator_code is null USER_PROFILE_CHECK_WITH_LT ORDER BY lt.LoanTransactionID desc, NEWID()
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForActiveRepaym: SELECT top 100 ll.*,ptr.due_amount FROM MelloServETL.dbo.LoanLevel ll join promise_to_repay ptr on ptr.loan_number= ll.loan_number join LoanTransaction lt on ll.loan_number=lt.loan_number WHERE repay_plan_type in ('41','43','20','26','29','23') AND repay_plan_status_code in ('A') and zone='ZONECODE' and first_principal_balance GREATER_THEN 0 and ISNULL(drafting_indicator,'N')='N' and LoanTransactionID=(select top(1) MAX(LoanTransactionID) USER_PROFILE_CHECK from MelloServETL.dbo.LoanTransaction lt where lt.loan_number=ll.loan_number) and consumer_indicator_code is null and ll.loan_number=lt.loan_number ORDER BY lt.LoanTransactionID desc, NEWID()
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForActiveModifi: select distinct top 100 * from [dbo].[LoanLevel] ll inner join [dbo].[ref_ld_valid_values] rf on rf.code = ll.repay_plan_type where ll.process_stop_code = '9' and ll.repay_plan_status_code = 'A' and ll.man_code = 'L' and rf.code_group = 'Modification Trial' and ll.repay_plan_status_code is not null and ll.process_stop_code='9' and ll.mod_trial_system_changes='0' and ll.bad_check_stop_code='0' and ll.foreclosure_stop_code='0' and ll. pif_stop_code='0' and ISNULL(ll.drafting_indicator,'N')='N' and zone='ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForBrokenOrDele: select top 100 * from [dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [dbo].[ref_ld_valid_values] rf on rf.code = ll.repay_plan_type where ll.process_stop_code = 'D' and ll.repay_plan_status_code in ('B','D') and ll.man_code = 'L' and rf.code_group in ('Modification Trial') and ll.next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN getdate() and ISNULL(ll.drafting_indicator,'N')='N' and zone='ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleOTPP: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE days_past_due_status = 'On-time' AND last_modified_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN '3' AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE days_past_due_status = 'On-time' AND last_modified_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN '3' AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL AND opt_out_stop_code = 'J' USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleOTPO: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE days_past_due_status = 'On-time' AND last_modified_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN '3' AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE days_past_due_status = 'On-time' AND last_modified_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN '3' AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL AND opt_out_stop_code = 'J' USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleOTPP: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code='0' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND delinquent_payment_count = '1' AND days_past_due_status = 'Past Due' AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null AND zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code='0' AND pif_stop_code='0' AND delinquent_payment_count = '1' AND days_past_due_status = 'Past Due' AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code is null AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND opt_out_stop_code = 'J' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleOTPD: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 and process_stop_code = '0' and bad_check_stop_code = '0' and foreclosure_stop_code='0' and pif_stop_code='0' and delinquent_payment_count = 2 and days_past_due_status = 'Delinquent' and escrow_balance != 0 and first_principal_balance > 5000 and client_number = 'P2KL' and IsDeleted=0 and (repay_plan_status_code not in ('B','D') or repay_plan_status_code is null) and consumer_indicator_code is null and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 and process_stop_code = '0' and bad_check_stop_code = '0' and foreclosure_stop_code='0' and pif_stop_code='0' and delinquent_payment_count = 2 and days_past_due_status = 'Delinquent' and escrow_balance != 0 and first_principal_balance > 5000 and client_number = 'P2KL' and IsDeleted=0 and consumer_indicator_code is null and zone = 'ZONECODE' AND opt_out_stop_code = 'J' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForEligibleHelo: SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 and delinquent_payment_count = 2 and days_past_due_status = 'Delinquent' AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND accrued_late_charge_amount = 0 AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code in ('0', '1', '7', 'C', 'E', 'G', 'I', 'Q', 'S', 'T', 'Y') AND (investor_id in ('L10', 'W10') OR investor_id like 'C%%') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > '0' AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and zone = 'ZONECODE' USER_PROFILE_CHECK ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='Monthly' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='Monthly' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC

SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l inner join PaymentSetup p on l.loan_number=p.LoanNumber WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND zone = 'ZONECODE' AND paymentstatus='Processing' AND LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='Monthly' AND RecPaymentSetUpDate LESS_THEN DATEADD(day,-1,GETDATE()) AND PaymentDate GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(day,2,GETDATE()) ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_GetActiveLoanForNonPayments: SELECT top 100 l.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] l WHERE is_active = 1 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_GetLoanLevelDetailsForPaperless: select * from LoanLevel ll INNER JOIN MelloServ.MelloServDomain.LoanInformation li on li.LoanNumber=ll.loan_number where is_active=1 and is_paid_in_full =0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' AND li.InhousePaperlessUpdateDate is null and (investor_id like 'F%' or investor_id like 'H%' or investor_id like 'G%' or investor_id like 'R%' or investor_id like 'L%' or investor_id like 'C%' or investor_id like 'W%')
xml.Query_GetHelocLoanLevelDetailsforPaperle: select * from LoanLevel ll INNER JOIN MelloServ.MelloServDomain.LoanInformation li on li.LoanNumber=ll.loan_number where is_active=1 and is_paid_in_full =0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' AND li.InhousePaperlessUpdateDate is null and [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null and is_paid_in_full =0 and (investor_id like 'F%' or investor_id like 'H%' or investor_id like 'G%' or investor_id like 'R%' or investor_id like 'L%' or investor_id like 'C%' or investor_id like 'W%')
xml.Query_GetLoansLevelDetailsForPayoffQuote: SELECT * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id is null and prepay_penalty_indicator = 'N')
xml.Query_GetLoansLevelDetailsForSMCVerifica: SELECT top 100 * FROM LoanLevel WHERE days_past_due_status = 'On-time' AND last_modified_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(DAY, -2, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AND is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN '3' AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 4, 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND client_number = 'P2KL' AND IsDeleted=0 AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL USER_PROFILE_CHECK AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_ExistingOTPSetupForTimeSensitiveCh: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) = CONVERT(DATE,cast(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) and ps.PaymentStatus = 'Processing' and ps.Channel in ('Servicing Portal','IVR') and ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestDPALoans: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND prepay_penalty_header_id ='DPA' and prepay_penalty_indicator ='Y' and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestInactiveLoa: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active != 1 AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestFHA_RHSLoan: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 and product_type in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S') AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestForeclosure: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 and product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND foreclosure_status_code IN ('A', 'S') AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestDelinquentL: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status in ('delinquent') AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestVALoans: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE is_active = 1 AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') AND loss_mitigation_indicator ='P' AND product_type = 'VA' AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestPIFLoans: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel where is_active = 1 AND product_type not in ('FHA','USDA/RHS') AND (foreclosure_status_code IS NULL OR foreclosure_status_code NOT IN ('A', 'S')) AND days_past_due_status not in ('delinquent') and loss_mitigation_indicator not in ('P' ) and product_type not in('VA') AND prepay_penalty_indicator not in ('Y') AND (prepay_penalty_header_id not in ('DPA') OR prepay_penalty_header_id is null) and pif_stop_code = '1' and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_IneligiblePayoffRequestTransferred: SELECT top 100 * from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel WHERE (pif_stop_code = 3 or is_transferred_to_third_party = 1) and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_OTPEligibleHELOCLoans: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] where [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null and delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN 3 and is_active=1 and foreclosure_stop_code not in ('1','2','3','4','5','6') and bad_check_stop_code not in ('1','4','6') and pif_stop_code not in ('1','2', '3','4', '5', '6') and process_stop_code not in ('2', '3', '5', '8', '9', 'B', 'F', 'H', 'L', 'M', 'N', 'P', 'R', 'U', 'W', '!') and first_principal_balance>0 and days_past_due_status ='On-Time' and drafting_indicator ='N' and zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_ExistingHelocOTPSetupForTimeSensit: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) = CONVERT(DATE,cast(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) and ps.PaymentStatus = 'Processing' and ps.Channel in ('Servicing Portal','IVR') and ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' and [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null and is_active=1 and zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_OntimeToPastdue: Select loan_number,delinquent_payment_count,next_payment_due_date,days_past_due_status, total_monthly_payment,principal_interest_amount, tax_and_insurance_amount,escrow_balance, accrued_late_charge_amount, nsf_fee_balance,other_fees,process_stop_code, foreclosure_status_code,bad_check_stop_code,pif_stop_code,zone,borrower_email,property_zip,borrower_ssn FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] where is_active =1 and foreclosure_stop_code ='0' and process_stop_code ='0' and bad_check_stop_code ='0' and pif_stop_code='0' and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null and (repay_plan_status_code not in ('B','D') or repay_plan_status_code is null) and next_payment_due_date = CONVERT(DATE,cast(DATEADD(month,datediff(month,0,getdate()),1) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) and zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_OntimeToPastdueHeloc: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] where [consumer_indicator_code] is not null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND delinquent_payment_count LESS_THEN 3 AND is_active=1 AND foreclosure_stop_code not in ('1','2','3','4','5','6') AND bad_check_stop_code not in ('1','4','6') AND pif_stop_code not in ('1','2', '3','4', '5', '6') AND process_stop_code not in ('2', '3', '5', '8', '9', 'B', 'F', 'H', 'L', 'M', 'N', 'P', 'R', 'U', 'W', '!') AND first_principal_balance>0 and (repay_plan_status_code not in ('B','D') or repay_plan_status_code is null) AND next_payment_due_date = CONVERT(DATE,cast(DATEADD(month,datediff(month,0,getdate()),1) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) AND zone = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_MortgageAutopayPrompt: SELECT next_payment_due_date npdd, drafting_indicator, zone, borrower_ssn,property_zip, * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 3, 0) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND zone = 'ZONECODE' and isnull(drafting_indicator,'N')='N' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_MortgageOTPOntimeWithSubsidy: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM LoanLevel where is_active = 1 AND process_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND replacement_reserve_balance GREATER_THEN 0.00 AND replacement_reserve_amount LESS_THEN 0.00 AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) , 0) AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND consumer_indicator_code IS NULL and repay_plan_status_code is null AND next_payment_due_date=subsidy_first_due_date AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_ServisBotEligibleLoans: SELECT TOP 10 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] where is_active=1 and pif_stop_code in (1,0,null) and process_stop_code in ( '0', 'P', 'T') and days_past_due_status in ('Past Due' ,'On-Time') AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_ActiveHelocDrawsLoans: SELECT TOP 100 LL.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] LL WHERE LL.is_active = 1 AND LL.foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND LL.process_stop_code = '0' AND LL.bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND LL.pif_stop_code = '0' AND LL.is_paid_in_full = '0' AND LL.is_transferred_to_third_party = '0' AND LL.disbursement_stop_code = '0' AND DATEDIFF(DAY, GETDATE(), LL.origination_date) LESS_THEN 90 AND LL.delinquent_payment_count = 0 AND LL.consumer_indicator_code IS NOT NULL AND LL.cls_product_code IS NOT NULL AND LL.first_principal_balance LESS_THEN LL.original_mortgage_amount AND LL.days_past_due_status IN ('Past Due', 'On-Time') AND LL.zone = 'ZONECODE' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM [MelloServ].[MelloServHeloc].[DrawRecords] DR WHERE DR.LoanNumber = LL.loan_number ) ORDER BY LL.next_payment_due_date DESC;
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithIneligibleForeclosur: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND foreclosure_stop_code in ('1','2','3','4','5','6','7','8','9') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and first_principal_balance>0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithIneligibleProcessSto: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code in('2','3','5','8','9','A','B','D','F','H','L','M','N','P','R','U','W','!') AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and first_principal_balance>0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithIneligibleBadCheckSt: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code in ('1','4','6') AND process_stop_code = '0' AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and first_principal_balance>0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithIneligiblePIFStopCod: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code in ('1','2','3','4','5','6') AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND process_stop_code = '0' AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and first_principal_balance>0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithIneligibleInvCodes: SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 1, 0) and next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND (investor_id not in ('L10','W10') and investor_id not like 'C%') AND process_stop_code = '0' AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') and first_principal_balance>0 AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithPrepay2Months: SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN DATEADD(MONTH,2, GETDATE()) AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code in ('0', '1', '7', 'C', 'E', 'G', 'I', 'Q', 'S', 'T', 'Y') AND (investor_id in ('L10', 'W10') OR investor_id like 'C%') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_HelocLoansWithDelinquentCountMoret: SELECT top 100 * FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] WHERE is_active = 1 AND delinquent_payment_count >= 2 AND ISNULL(consumer_indicator_code,'') != '' AND process_stop_code in ('0', '1', '7', 'C', 'E', 'G', 'I', 'Q', 'S', 'T', 'Y') AND (investor_id in ('L10', 'W10') OR investor_id like 'C%') AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND first_principal_balance > 5000 AND (drafting_indicator is null OR drafting_indicator = 'N') AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY next_payment_due_date DESC
xml.Query_FMExistingAutopaySetup: SELECT ll.*,ps.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where is_active=1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 0, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) and ps.PaymentDate >= GETDATE() AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ll.drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') AND ps.paymentStatus in ('Processing','Pending') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency in ('Monthly','BiWeekly') AND DATEPART(dw, PaymentDate) not IN (1, 7) and ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY ps.paymentDate
xml.Query_FMExistingOTPSetup: SELECT ll.*,ps.* from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,DATEADD(day,2, GETDATE())) and CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,ll.next_payment_due_date) and FORMAT(ps.PaymentDate,'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(ll.next_payment_due_date,'yyyy-MM') and DAY(ps.PaymentDate) LESS_THEN_EQUALTO 15 AND LEFT(investor_id, 1) IN ('F', 'H', 'G', 'E', 'R', 'L', 'P') and ps.PaymentStatus in ('Processing','Scheduled') and ll.drafting_indicator != 'Y' and ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_HelocExistingAutopaySetup: SELECT ll.*,ps.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where is_active=1 AND next_payment_due_date GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 0, 0) AND next_payment_due_date LESS_THEN DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) + 2, 0) and ps.PaymentDate >= GETDATE() AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ll.drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ps.paymentStatus in ('Processing','Pending') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency in ('Monthly','BiWeekly') AND DATEPART(dw, PaymentDate) not IN (1, 7) AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY ps.paymentDate
xml.Query_HelocExistingOTPSetup: SELECT ll.*,ps.* from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,DATEADD(day,2, GETDATE())) and CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,ll.next_payment_due_date) and FORMAT(ps.PaymentDate,'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(ll.next_payment_due_date,'yyyy-MM') and DAY(ps.PaymentDate) LESS_THEN_EQUALTO 15 AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null and ps.PaymentStatus in ('Processing','Scheduled') and ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' and ll.drafting_indicator != 'Y' AND ll.investor_id != 'W10' and ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_HElocExistingOTPForBankValidation: SELECT ll.*,ps.* from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE()) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ps.PaymentStatus in ('Processing','Scheduled') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' and ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_FMExistingOTPForBankValidation: SELECT ll.*,ps.* from [MelloServETL].[dbo].LoanLevel ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where CONVERT(DATE,ps.PaymentDate) GREATER_THEN_EQUALTO CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE()) AND [consumer_indicator_code] is Null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ps.PaymentStatus in ('Processing','Scheduled') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency='OneTime' and ZONE = 'ZONECODE'
xml.Query_FMExistingAutopayOnToday: SELECT ps.PaymentDate,ps.Channel, ll.*,ps.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where is_active=1 AND cast(ps.PaymentDate as date) = CONVERT(DATE,cast(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND ll.drafting_indicator = 'Y' and consumer_indicator_code is Null and [cls_product_code] is not null AND ps.paymentStatus in ('Processing','Pending') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency in ('Monthly','BiWeekly') AND ps.Channel != 'Agent Portal' AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY ps.paymentDate
xml.Query_HelocExistingAutopayOnToday: SELECT ps.PaymentDate,ps.Channel, ll.*,ps.* FROM [MelloServETL].[dbo].[LoanLevel] ll join [MelloServETL].[dbo].[PaymentSetup] ps on ll.loan_number=ps.LoanNumber where is_active=1 AND cast(ps.PaymentDate as date) = CONVERT(DATE,cast(GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Central Standard Time' as DATETIME2)) AND process_stop_code = '0' AND pif_stop_code = '0' AND bad_check_stop_code = '0' AND foreclosure_stop_code = '0' AND opt_out_stop_code is null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ll.drafting_indicator = 'Y' AND [consumer_indicator_code] is not null AND [cls_product_code] is not null AND ps.paymentStatus in ('Processing','Pending') AND ps.LoanPaymentTypeFrequency in ('Monthly','BiWeekly') AND ps.Channel != 'Agent Portal' AND ZONE = 'ZONECODE' ORDER BY ps.paymentDate
